metadata.title: CVE-2018-16369 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: XRef::fetch in XRef.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted pdf file, related to AcroForm::scanField, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. NOTE: this might overlap CVE-2018-7453.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication that this affects poppler, marking as not-affected

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
